description: Great Lakes Forestry Centre (GLFC) Recycling Services.  located in Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario, Canada
full_summary:
**Recycling Services**
=======================

**Reference:** PW-22-01015876
**Amendment:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 5000069252

**Publication Date:** December 5, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 19, 2022, 13:00:00

**Announcement:**
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites proposals for Recycling Services at the Great Lakes Forestry Centre (GLFC) located in Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario, Canada.

**Contract Details:**

* Contracting Entity: Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)
* Regions of Opportunity: Ontario (except NCR)
* Regions of Delivery: Same as Regions of Opportunity
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Tender Requirements:**

* Unsolicited communication of interest is not permitted; potential suppliers must submit a proposal through the Canada Buys online procurement system.
* Proposals must comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

**Proposal Submission:**

* Potential suppliers must submit their proposals electronically through the Canada Buys online procurement system.
* Proposals must be received by the closing date and time listed above.

**Supporting Documents:**

* RFP Document: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/05/5e03ff356be106058c3e1a775ef07067/173283_-_rfp_nrcan_5000069252.pdf
* Questions and Answers (Q&A): https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/09/4c50a6a41b2715dd431dc24f0860f120/questions_and_answers_1_-_question_et_reponses_1_1.pdf
* RFP Amendment 1: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/09/3c34706a71a910df715ff987378a027f/rfp_amendment_1_-_modification_de_ddp_1_2.pdf

**Point of Contact:**
Dhanani, Shazeen
Email: shazeen.dhanani@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
Note: Due to circumstances beyond our control, the contact information for the point of contact has been omitted. Should you have any questions, you may contact NRCan through its online
